H0.text: list of strict nature reserve in the philippines. Mayon Volcano

H1.text: list of strict nature reserve in the philippines. Mount Pulag

H2.text: list of strict nature reserve in the philippines. Mount Kitanglad

H3.text: list of strict nature reserve in the philippines. Palawan

A6.text: The volcano was declared a national park on July 20, 1938, the first in the nation.

A7.text: It is the centerpiece of the Albay Biosphere Reserve, declared by UNESCO in 2016.

A8.text: Strict nature reserves are areas which are protected from all but light human use in order to protect its biodiversity and also possibly its geological/geomorphological features.
